&FlowMultiTagRowRequest; declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000)
select top 0 tr.id, tl_ck, ck_nt, a.tk_ck, ma_thue, thue_suat, tk_thue, thue_nt, ma_kh2, c.tk_cn, dien_giai, ck, thue &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; into #d from #tagRow tr, d21$000000 a, dmtk c
set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, tl_ck, ck_nt, rtrim(a.tk_ck) as tk_ck, rtrim(ma_thue) as ma_thue, thue_suat, rtrim(tk_thue) as tk_thue, thue_nt, rtrim(ma_kh2) as ma_kh2, isnull(c.tk_cn, 0), rtrim(dien_giai) as dien_giai, ck, thue &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join d21$%Partition a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 left join dmtk c on a.tk_thue = c.tk '
select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end
select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField; from #d &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
